frontmatter.title: Implementing Amplitude analytics in a macOS app
frontmatter.staticPreview: I've been moving towards Amplitude for analytics in my personal apps, since it seems to have the best user experience and easiest itegration vs Google Analytics and Mixpanel (plus, it has a free tier!), but I only recently implemented analytics in a macOS app..
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I've been moving towards [Amplitude](https://amplitude.com/) for analytics in my personal apps, since it seems to have the best user experience and easiest itegration vs Google Analytics and Mixpanel (plus, it has a free tier!), but I only recently implemented analytics in a macOS app...
